titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Hillary Rodham Clinton Address Commemorating the Comer School Development Program, School of Medicine, Yale University
Clinton (Hillary Rodham) Address Commemorating the Comer School Development Program, School of Medicine, Yale University Papers
titlestmt.author: compiled by Staff of Manuscripts and Archives

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Tuesday April 23, 2019 at 08:07

did.unittitle: Hillary Rodham Clinton address commemorating the Comer School Development Program, School of Medicine, Yale University

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The address, given on the 30th anniversary of the Comer School Development Program at the Yale School of Medicine, was part of a symposium titled Child Development: The Foundation of Education. The symposium celebrated the Comer School Development program, established in 1968 by Dr. James Comer to promote collaboration among parents, educators, and the community.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 27-E (YRG 27-E), Records of departments, programs, and projects of the Yale School of Medicine.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Hillary Rodham Clinton Address Commemorating the Comer School Development Program, School of Medicine, Yale University (RU 398). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The address, given on the 30th anniversary of the Comer School Development Program at the Yale School of Medicine, was part of a symposium titled Child Development: The Foundation of Education. The symposium celebrated the Comer School Development program, established in 1968 by Dr. James Comer to promote collaboration among parents, educators, and the community.

did.unittitle: Address by Hillary Rodham Clinton commemorating the Comer School Development Program
